feed.title: Diary of a Software Engineer
feed.subtitle: This is personal blog about some of the Software Engineering learnings which I have on a day to day basis. This might sometime also be turning a place for my opinions.

entry.title: Learnings with Neovim
entry.content: I have recently shifted from vim to neovim in hopes finding some of the auto completions more manageable. I tried to have completion for vim 8.1 with using a LSP server protocol but it was behaving very much wonky. Some other motivation to try out neovim is to use Vim-Plug as well as deoplete completion manager.
entry.summary: I have recently shifted from vim to neovim in hopes finding some of the auto completions more manageable. I tried to have completion for vim 8.1 with using a LSP server protocol but it was behaving very much wonky. Some other motivation to try out neovim is to use Vim-Plug as well as deoplete completion manager.
